Aaron Calfos-Folkes

Unfiltered

Unfiltered is a fashion magazine that celebrates authenticity, self-expression, and individuality. Created as a response to the pressures of perfection in modern society, Unfiltered encourages people to show up as their true selves, boldly and unapologetically. Through a mix of street and studio photography, thoughtful design, and reflective storytelling, the magazine explores how clothing becomes a tool for self-discovery and empowerment.

https://readymag.website/5500065
